bibdata.title: A stabilizing comonomer : II. Stabilization and polymerization characteristics : The previous reports in this series have the NBS report nos. 6297, 6484, 6645, 6928, 7093, 7192, 7437, 7587, 7796, 8033, 8186, 8504, 8628, 8919, 9028, 9389, 9500, 9601, 9803, 9905, 10004, 10074 and 10326.
